What is data mining?
===
Discovery of new patterns

* Cluster analysis  
* Anomaly detection 
* Rule mining
* Regression
* Summarization 


What is not data mining?
====
* Data management
* Data preprocessing
* Transformation
* Modeling / inference
* Visualization
